website_summaries.verdict: A unique spray bottle makes this vinegar perfect for lightly misting salads.
pros: Spray applicator makes it easy to control amount applied to food
Users agree the vinegar has a great taste

customer_reviews.title: Spritz  Spray Mist
customer_reviews.text: Spritz, spray, mist ... call it what you like .. but call it.. because it is a must have for a quick spray over your salad - especially if you also included some fruit too like strawberries, mist it over your avocado toast, spritz it over your roasted brussel sprouts ... & marry it with olive oil wherever you can .. It is so easy to use & you will have no more soggy foods because you did not have to pour or ladle .. you simply spritzed, sprayed pr misted ..... ah , the good life with true flavorful healthy food. Thank you Ellora Farms.
customer_reviews.author: D Noel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a spray vinegar and olive oil in a glass pump bottle primarily for air frying. This not only filled the bill but surpassed it. The spray was very generous and the flavor excellent. I am particularly partial to Greek olive oil so this was a bonus. The glass bottle and spray mechanism are of high quality with initial usage. Only time will tell if this holds up and I anticipate that it will. I highly recommend this product to add to your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: VEZGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but could be even better if bottle were refillable!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, excellent spray! Only con is that bottles are very small and I would have like it if they were refillable. I hated throwing away such a good spraying glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: rosy1111

customer_reviews.title: Love these Ellora Farms products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra virgin olive oil and the balsamic vinegar in glass spray bottles. It’s perfect and handy to spritz a fresh green salad, raw or roasted veggies. Tastes delicious! I also love the way the bottles look. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Gramsgarden

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for work lunches
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for work lunches. They are glass bottles which is better than I expected. They were wrapped properly in bubble wrap to handle the journey. It's weird to spray oil and vinegar on my salads, but it less of a mess to worry about than bringing in normal bottles of both.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mist. Very effective application
customer_reviews.text: This is a really clever product. I use it to spray on salads, things I’m cooking and things I’m prepping. It is such a fine mist, it’s just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene B Block

customer_reviews.title: Weak, thin, and watery.
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong, need to use a lot of it. Very watery compared to a good balsamic. This is my first use of a spray balsamic....maybe it needs to be thin for spraying???
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: omg sooo good!
customer_reviews.text: This is so delicious! I immediately ordered the balsamic reduction. Perfection in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dlr

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely purchase again and recommend for anyone looking for a lighter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious. Packaging secure, visually attractive. The oil and vinegar have just the right flavor and density to enhance my salads. I would definitely purchase again and recommend for anyone looking for a lighter, yet flavorful way to enjoy your foods.
customer_reviews.author: ljmumford

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan and repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: I've made my second purchase of this vinegar. It's perfect for spraying on salads. The mist is fine and it's easy to control the amount because of this. The taste is great! The two pack is perfect for keeping one bottle at home and another at the office. I haven't found spray Balsamic Vinegar in any grocery store, and I'm glad I found this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.inRVA

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the spray bottle idea but the vinegar isn’t great and doesn’t seem like balsamic at all. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SanFranMan

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like it; it’s a bit too sweet, I love the spray bottle but the flavor was not good for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since spray oil !
customer_reviews.text: Spraying balsamic vinegar is SO smart!! I always wind up with too much, but this has solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea...
customer_reviews.text: I would of givin it a 5 star but I just wish I could refill The bottles.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDreams

customer_reviews.title: Quality oil/vinegar in a great spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful products good quailty oil and vinegar! Really great for a fresh salad and helpful to keep calories low. Also nice for enhancing your vegetables, sandwiches, rice, pizza, etc. I had something similar in Italy and was glad to find this on Amazon. Spray add salt, pepper, other spices and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Andy J LaVigne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. For dieters, this is the perfect dressing for salads. Very easy to control and because of the size of the bottles, they are very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds flavor with few calories
customer_reviews.text: I squirt this balsamic vinegar on my morning eggs, on salads, on steamed veggies--even on broiled salmon. It livens up any dish, especially those that don't have a lot of sparkle to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kline

customer_reviews.title: Balsamic vinegar spray
customer_reviews.text: Very good I spray on salads. I would like to see a bottle that you can remove top to use as a refill. This pkg is crimped so no removable is possible.
customer_reviews.author: g#####

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is my second order. I love it. I spray a little on my microwave popcorn. I use it on my salad. It last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mary lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Me only complain its that the bottle its to small
customer_reviews.author: rolaynd

customer_reviews.title: great idea!
customer_reviews.text: very tasty balsamic delivered in a nicely packaged and extremely handy spray top bottle. It's great for spraying over top a salad - we use it almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: Omoishi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just a little spray goes a long way. I use it on a variety of foods and love it.
customer_reviews.author: JMACVOL

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I bought them to keep at work ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bought them to keep at work to put on salads.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Blackard

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the delicious oil & balsamic! & also the great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I keep this product at work for my salads that I have for lunch. The sprayer on each bottle worked great to allow just the right amount on the salad. Taste is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love these spray bottles and the flavors are terrific. I have used them on avocados to make a quick dressing and they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Traina

customer_reviews.title: Convenient balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice balsamic and easy way to control the calories and application for salads.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: I use every day
customer_reviews.text: Great size spray bottles, easy to use. Good flavor, not overwhelming. I use these every day to dress salad greens.
customer_reviews.author: HomeTulip

customer_reviews.title: Yay spray bottles!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses vinegar and oil on everything and it's very hard t find them in a spray. This is the second time I've ordered from Ellora Farms cause she was very happy with the product so this us a Christmas gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Meg DeSpirt

customer_reviews.title: This is truly an excellent product. The taste is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an excellent product. The taste is amazing. I thought it was pretty expensive at first, but you use so little of it, that it is actually very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Controlled amount
customer_reviews.text: Love how you can control how much you use with the spray bottle. My other favorite thing is that the product is from Crete!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This idea of the spray bottle is great. The right amount of oil and vinegar for any taste bud
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Both are excellent. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased the olive oil and decided to try the vinegar. Both are excellent. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mother and she gives it 5 thumbs up..........and she uses lots of olive oil!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Z.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect as always
customer_reviews.text: They have best EVOO I ever had and they delivered exactly as promised. This was our third time to order from them and there will be a forth.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Balsamic Vinegar bottle!
customer_reviews.text: The Olive oil arrived just fine BUT the Balsamic Vinegar had been leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: As good as Ellora olive oil, and you can spray your face and brush your teeth with it.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, the taste is so rich and pleasant. I spritz my face with this after scrubbing with baking soda, and I also squirt it in my mouth and brush teeth with a soft brush. Surprising how effective a few squirts are as toothpaste. It really combines beautifully with Ellora olive oil, which is the best in the world. The slim shape makes it easy to put in the medicine cabinet behind the bathroom mirror. You can also buy one of the same bottles with olive oil, and spray the olive oil and vinegar on your salad if you're dieting.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great spray capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and great spray capabilities. I was looking for a spray version of Oil/Vinegar to lower calories on my salads. This works perfectly and tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Deana E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am currently using them to spray onto my salads. I will definitely be purchasing more for myself and for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Alikona16

customer_reviews.title: Great product and leave on counter beautiful bottles
customer_reviews.text: we use it everyday. Great product and leave on counter beautiful bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Curry

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: Oil does not spray. Big drips. Messy bottle. Very disappointed in the product. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Little did I know
customer_reviews.text: Little did I know these balsamic bottles were a spray. It stated on the box that you could not return them, so I felt like I was stuck with them. Never again will I order balsamic vinegar, especially it being packaged in a spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Zaborowski

product_meta.title: Ellora Farms, Balsamic Vinegar in glass spray bottle, clog-free pump, barrel aged vinegar, single origin Crete, Greece, all-natural, 3.38 oz, Pack of 2
product_meta.description:
Size:2 Pack Balsamic Spray100% PURE AGED BALSAMIC VINEGAR IN HEAVY GLASS SPRAY BOTTLES | SPRAY TO THE LAST DROP | BORN AND BOTTLED AT THE ViNYARDS OF CRETE, GREECE 

From the prized vineyards of the Island in Crete comes the Ellora Farms Balsamic vinegar, perfectly aged for the aroma and the luxurious indulgence. This premium quality balsamic vinegar produced is from red grapes of Greek varieties. Aged for six months in oak barrels to produce a great sweet and sour flavor. A 100% natural product with no added coloring's or sweeteners. 

 Spray to the last drop with the innovative pump, designed to give a distinctive look in your kitchen or cabinet. For more information visit the website www.elloraframs.com and watch our video on you-tube: http://bit.ly/Elloravideo
feature_bullets: FOOD PAIRING PERFECTION - Aged for six months in oak barrels to produce a great sweet and sour flavor. This delicious Balsamic Spray pairs perfectly and with portion control on your ice creams, summer salads, feta, mussels, mozzarella cheese, feta cheese, meat, fish, strawberries, roasted vegetables or anything you please for that luxurious indulgence in food. A 100% natural product with no added colorings or sweeteners.

PRIZED BALSAMIC SPRAY - From the prized vineyards of the Island in Crete, Greece comes the Ellora Farms Balsamic vinegar, perfectly aged for the aroma and the luxurious indulgence. Made with 100% Grape must and grown in the centuries old vineyards this is a 100% Natural Product, No Caramels, No Coloring, No Sulfites and No Preservatives added. Spray to the last drop with the innovative pump, designed to give a distinctive look in your kitchen or cabinet.

LOADED WITH HEALTH BENEFITS – A perfect complement for your diet and can be used as a low-fat additive and part of a heart-healthy diet. This low calorie, vegan and vegetarian friendly vinegar helps lower cholesterol, aids in digestion and supports weight loss. Balsamic Vinegar has very low glycemic index and is considered diabetic-friendly, It improves blood circulation & improve your overall skin health. Full of Anti-Oxidants and Minerals it is recommended by the Atkins, South Beach, Keto diet

GIFT OF BALSAMIC – Not your regular bottle. This Clog Free spray is a perfect gift for any occasion: Birthdays, Anniversaries, Mother’s Day Father’s Day, Cook-outs on Memorial day, Summer parties, Father’s day, Chef friend, Holiday, or Christmas gift or for gourmet cooking and creating the most extraordinary dishes.
